# =========================
# Java build files
# =========================
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear
*.log

# =========================
# NetBeans-specific files
# =========================
nbbuild/
build/
dist/
nbdist/
.nb-gradle/
**/nbproject/private/
**/nbproject/Makefile-*.mk
**/nbproject/Package-*.bash

# Optional: ignore NetBeans lock files
**/.LCK*

# =========================
# IntelliJ IDEA-specific files
# =========================
.idea/
*.iml
*.iws
out/

# =========================
# OS-generated files
# =========================
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# =========================
# VS Code (nếu ai đó mở bằng VS Code)
# =========================
.vscode/
